pr_title: fix: update test-ng to version without bsh dependency that is vulnerable, org.apache-extras.beanshell:bsh is vulnerable to CVE-2016-2510, note, we do not use bsh in any runtime, it's test only

timeline.message:
fix: update test-ng to version without bsh dependency that is vulnerable, org.apache-extras.beanshell:bsh is vulnerable to CVE-2016-2510, note, we do not use bsh in any runtime, it's test only

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: autoboxing double to double object to double does not work in testng 7.3.0

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: update copyright for 2020

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: upgrade the behaviors of testng

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

fix: test structure changed with test-ng

Signed-off-by: Paul Bastide <pbastide@us.ibm.com>

timeline.author: lmsurpre

replies.bodyText: nm, now i see ProfileTestFactory.java (which is now removed). :-)
